data.name: Ghost Rider (Robbie)
data.description: Victim of gang violence and bonded to the Spirit of Vengeance, Robbie Reyes saps his enemies' health with bleed and unleashes devastating charged attacks.

starItems.name: Ghost Rider (Robbie)
starItems.description: Victim of gang violence and bonded to the Spirit of Vengeance, Robbie Reyes saps his enemies' health with bleed and unleashes devastating charged attacks.

1.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>60%</color> Piercing.
On target Block, Bonus Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>60%</color> Piercing.

Chain to <color=#86e619>1</color> adjacent target for <color=#86e619>60%</color> Piercing.

Gain +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.

Characters killed by this attack cannot be revived.
1.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>20%</color> Piercing to primary and secondary attacks
Apply <color=#fff568>Bleed</color> to primary attack

2.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>80%</color> Piercing + apply <color=#fff568>Bleed</color>.
On target Block, Bonus Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>80%</color> Piercing.

Chain to <color=#86e619>1</color> adjacent target for <color=#86e619>80%</color> Piercing.

Gain +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.

Characters killed by this attack cannot be revived.
2.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>20%</color> Piercing to primary and secondary attacks

3.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>100%</color> Piercing + apply <color=#fff568>Bleed</color>.
On target Block, Bonus Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>100%</color> Piercing.

Chain to <color=#86e619>1</color> adjacent target for <color=#86e619>100%</color> Piercing.

Gain +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.

Characters killed by this attack cannot be revived.
3.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>30%</color> Piercing to primary and secondary attacks

4.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>130%</color> Piercing + apply <color=#fff568>Bleed</color>.
On target Block, Bonus Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>130%</color> Piercing.

Chain to <color=#86e619>1</color> adjacent target for <color=#86e619>130%</color> Piercing.

Gain +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.

Characters killed by this attack cannot be revived.
4.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>30%</color> Piercing to primary and secondary attacks

5.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>160%</color> Piercing + apply <color=#fff568>Bleed</color>.
On target Block, Bonus Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>160%</color> Piercing.

Chain to <color=#86e619>1</color> adjacent target for <color=#86e619>160%</color> Piercing.

Gain +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.

Characters killed by this attack cannot be revived.
5.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>30%</color> Piercing to primary and secondary attacks
On Bonus Attack, apply <color=#fff568>Bleed</color> to the primary target

6.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>190%</color> Piercing + apply <color=#fff568>Bleed</color>.
On target Block, Bonus Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>190%</color> Piercing + apply <color=#fff568>Bleed</color>.

Chain to <color=#86e619>1</color> adjacent target for <color=#86e619>190%</color> Piercing.

Gain +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.

Characters killed by this attack cannot be revived.
6.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>60%</color> Piercing to primary and secondary attacks
Apply <color=#fff568>Bleed</color> to secondary attacks

7.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>250%</color> Piercing + apply <color=#fff568>Bleed</color>.
On target Block, Bonus Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>250%</color> Piercing + apply <color=#fff568>Bleed</color>.

Chain to <color=#86e619>1</color> adjacent target for <color=#86e619>250%</color> Piercing + apply <color=#fff568>Bleed</color>.

Gain +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.

Characters killed by this attack cannot be revived.

1.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>60%</color> Piercing.
Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>30%</color> Piercing.

Apply <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>SECRET DEFENDER</color> and <color=#fff568>CITY</color> <color=#fff568>MYSTIC</color> allies.

This attack is Unavoidable and cannot be blocked.
Characters killed by this attack cannot be revived.
1.nextUpgrade:
Apply <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color> to primary target
+<color=#86e619>30%</color> Piercing to secondary attack
In <color=#fff568>ARENA</color>, gain +<color=#86e619>500%</color> Extra Focus for this attack

2.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>60%</color> Piercing + apply <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color>.
Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>60%</color> Piercing.

Apply <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>SECRET DEFENDER</color> and <color=#fff568>CITY</color> <color=#fff568>MYSTIC</color> allies.

In <color=#fff568>ARENA</color>, gain +<color=#86e619>500%</color> Extra Focus for this attack.

This attack is Unavoidable and cannot be blocked.
Characters killed by this attack cannot be revived.
2.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>20%</color> Piercing to primary attack
+<color=#86e619>40%</color> Piercing to secondary attack

3.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>80%</color> Piercing + apply <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color>.
Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>100%</color> Piercing.

Apply <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>SECRET DEFENDER</color> and <color=#fff568>CITY</color> <color=#fff568>MYSTIC</color> allies.

In <color=#fff568>ARENA</color>, gain +<color=#86e619>500%</color> Extra Focus for this attack.

This attack is Unavoidable and cannot be blocked.
Characters killed by this attack cannot be revived.
3.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>40%</color> Piercing to secondary attack
Clear <color=#86e619>3</color> positive effects on all secondary attack targets
Gain <color=#fff568>Immunity</color>

4.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>80%</color> Piercing + apply <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color>.
Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>140%</color> Piercing + clear <color=#86e619>3</color> positive effects.

Apply <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>SECRET DEFENDER</color> and <color=#fff568>CITY</color> <color=#fff568>MYSTIC</color> allies.
Gain <color=#fff568>Immunity</color>.

In <color=#fff568>ARENA</color>, gain +<color=#86e619>500%</color> Extra Focus for this attack.

This attack is Unavoidable and cannot be blocked.
Characters killed by this attack cannot be revived.
4.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>20%</color> Piercing to primary attack
+<color=#86e619>40%</color> Piercing to secondary attack
Apply <color=#fff568>Heal Block</color> to all secondary attack targets

5.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>100%</color> Piercing + apply <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color>.
Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>180%</color> Piercing + clear <color=#86e619>3</color> positive effects + apply <color=#fff568>Heal Block</color>.

Apply <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>SECRET DEFENDER</color> and <color=#fff568>CITY</color> <color=#fff568>MYSTIC</color> allies.
Gain <color=#fff568>Immunity</color>.

In <color=#fff568>ARENA</color>, gain +<color=#86e619>500%</color> Extra Focus for this attack.

This attack is Unavoidable and cannot be blocked.
Characters killed by this attack cannot be revived.
5.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>40%</color> Piercing to secondary attack
Apply <color=#fff568>Slow</color> and <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color> to all secondary attack targets

6.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>100%</color> Piercing + apply <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color>.
Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>220%</color> Piercing + clear <color=#86e619>3</color> positive effects + apply <color=#fff568>Heal Block</color>, <color=#fff568>Slow</color>, and <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color>.

Apply <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>SECRET DEFENDER</color> and <color=#fff568>CITY</color> <color=#fff568>MYSTIC</color> allies.
Gain <color=#fff568>Immunity</color>.

In <color=#fff568>ARENA</color>, gain +<color=#86e619>500%</color> Extra Focus for this attack.

This attack is Unavoidable and cannot be blocked.
Characters killed by this attack cannot be revived.
6.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>50%</color> Piercing to primary attack
+<color=#86e619>60%</color> Piercing to secondary attack
Gain <color=#fff568>Immunity</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns

7.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>150%</color> Piercing + apply <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color>.
Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>280%</color> Piercing + clear <color=#86e619>3</color> positive effects + apply <color=#fff568>Heal Block</color>, <color=#fff568>Slow</color>, and <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color>.

Apply <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>SECRET DEFENDER</color> and <color=#fff568>CITY</color> <color=#fff568>MYSTIC</color> allies.
Gain <color=#fff568>Immunity</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns.

In <color=#fff568>ARENA</color>, gain +<color=#86e619>500%</color> Extra Focus for this attack.

This attack is Unavoidable and cannot be blocked.
Characters killed by this attack cannot be revived.

1.description:
Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>60%</color> Piercing + <color=#86e619>20%</color> Drain + apply <color=#fff568>Heal Block</color>.

In <color=#fff568>ARENA</color>, gain +<color=#86e619>500%</color> Extra Focus for this attack.

This attack is Unavoidable and cannot be blocked.
Characters killed by this attack cannot be revived.
1.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>30%</color> Piercing to all enemies
Prolong the duration of all <color=#fff568>Bleed</color> on all enemies by <color=#86e619>1</color>

2.description:
Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>90%</color> Piercing + <color=#86e619>20%</color> Drain + apply <color=#fff568>Heal Block</color>.
Prolong the duration of all <color=#fff568>Bleed</color> on all enemies by <color=#86e619>1</color>.

In <color=#fff568>ARENA</color>, gain +<color=#86e619>500%</color> Extra Focus for this attack.

This attack is Unavoidable and cannot be blocked.
Characters killed by this attack cannot be revived.
2.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>30%</color> Piercing to all enemies
Apply +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>DEFENDER</color> allies

3.description:
Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>120%</color> Piercing + <color=#86e619>20%</color> Drain + apply <color=#fff568>Heal Block</color>.
Prolong the duration of all <color=#fff568>Bleed</color> on all enemies by <color=#86e619>1</color>.

In <color=#fff568>ARENA</color>, gain +<color=#86e619>500%</color> Extra Focus for this attack.

Apply +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>DEFENDER</color> allies.

This attack is Unavoidable and cannot be blocked.
Characters killed by this attack cannot be revived.
3.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>50%</color> Piercing to all enemies
Apply <color=#fff568>Heal Block</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns

4.description:
Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>170%</color> Piercing + <color=#86e619>20%</color> Drain + apply <color=#fff568>Heal Block</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns.
Prolong the duration of all <color=#fff568>Bleed</color> on all enemies by <color=#86e619>1</color>.

In <color=#fff568>ARENA</color>, gain +<color=#86e619>500%</color> Extra Focus for this attack.

Apply +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>DEFENDER</color> allies.

This attack is Unavoidable and cannot be blocked.
Characters killed by this attack cannot be revived.
4.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>50%</color> Piercing to all enemies
Apply <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color>

5.description:
Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>220%</color> Piercing + <color=#86e619>20%</color> Drain + apply <color=#fff568>Heal Block</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns and <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color>.
Prolong the duration of all <color=#fff568>Bleed</color> on all enemies by <color=#86e619>1</color>.

In <color=#fff568>ARENA</color>, gain +<color=#86e619>500%</color> Extra Focus for this attack.

Apply +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>DEFENDER</color> allies.

This attack is Unavoidable and cannot be blocked.
Characters killed by this attack cannot be revived.

6.description:
Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>220%</color> Piercing + <color=#86e619>50%</color> Drain + apply <color=#fff568>Heal Block</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns, <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color>, and <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Bleed</color>.
Prolong the duration of all <color=#fff568>Bleed</color> on all enemies by <color=#86e619>1</color>.

In <color=#fff568>ARENA</color>, gain +<color=#86e619>500%</color> Extra Focus for this attack.

Apply +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>DEFENDER</color> allies.

This attack is Unavoidable and cannot be blocked.
Characters killed by this attack cannot be revived.
6.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>80%</color> Piercing to all enemies
Apply <color=#86e619>3</color> <color=#fff568>Bleed</color> to all enemies
In <color=#fff568>ARENA</color>, apply <color=#fff568>Trauma</color> to all enemies

7.description:
Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>300%</color> Piercing + <color=#86e619>50%</color> Drain + apply <color=#fff568>Heal Block</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns, <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color>, and <color=#86e619>3</color> <color=#fff568>Bleed</color>.
Prolong the duration of all <color=#fff568>Bleed</color> on all enemies by <color=#86e619>1</color>.

In <color=#fff568>ARENA</color>:
 > Apply <color=#fff568>Trauma</color> to all enemies.
 > Gain +<color=#86e619>500%</color> Extra Focus for this attack.

Apply +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>DEFENDER</color> allies.

This attack is Unavoidable and cannot be blocked.
Characters killed by this attack cannot be revived.

1.description:
When an ally is attacked, gain +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.

On any Turn, if this character has <color=#86e619>5</color> or more <color=#fff568>Charged</color>:
 > Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>50%</color> Piercing. Characters killed by this attack cannot be revived.
 > Lose <color=#86e619>5</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.

When <color=#fff568>Bleed</color> is applied to an enemy, fill Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>10%</color>.
1.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>50%</color> Piercing to all enemies
On any Turn, if this character has <color=#86e619>5</color> or more <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, clear <color=#86e619>2</color> positive effects on all enemies

2.description:
When an ally is attacked, gain +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.

On any Turn, if this character has <color=#86e619>5</color> or more <color=#fff568>Charged</color>:
 > Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>100%</color> Piercing + clear <color=#86e619>2</color> positive effects. Characters killed by this attack cannot be revived.
 > Lose <color=#86e619>5</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.

When <color=#fff568>Bleed</color> is applied to an enemy, fill Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>10%</color>.
2.nextUpgrade:
Gain +<color=#86e619>100%</color> Focus
<color=#fff568>SECRET DEFENDER</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>100%</color> Focus

3.description:
When an ally is attacked, gain +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.

On any Turn, if this character has <color=#86e619>5</color> or more <color=#fff568>Charged</color>:
 > Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>100%</color> Piercing + clear <color=#86e619>2</color> positive effects. Characters killed by this attack cannot be revived.
 > Lose <color=#86e619>5</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.

When <color=#fff568>Bleed</color> is applied to an enemy, fill Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>10%</color>.

Gain +<color=#86e619>100%</color> Focus
<color=#fff568>SECRET DEFENDER</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>100%</color> Focus
3.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>50%</color> Piercing to all enemies
On any Turn, if this character has <color=#86e619>5</color> or more <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, apply <color=#fff568>Bleed</color> and <color=#fff568>Disrupted</color> to all enemies

4.description:
When an ally is attacked, gain +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.

On any Turn, if this character has <color=#86e619>5</color> or more <color=#fff568>Charged</color>:
 > Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>150%</color> Piercing + clear <color=#86e619>2</color> positive effects + apply <color=#fff568>Bleed</color> and <color=#fff568>Disrupted</color>. Characters killed by this attack cannot be revived.
 > Lose <color=#86e619>5</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.

When <color=#fff568>Bleed</color> is applied to an enemy, fill Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>10%</color>.

Gain +<color=#86e619>100%</color> Focus
<color=#fff568>SECRET DEFENDER</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>100%</color> Focus
4.nextUpgrade:
Lower Resistance of all <color=#fff568>BIO</color> enemies by <color=#86e619>100%</color>
Lower the Counterattack Chance for all <color=#fff568>BIO</color> enemies with <color=#fff568>Immunity</color> by <color=#86e619>100%</color>

5.description:
When an ally is attacked, gain +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.

On any Turn, if this character has <color=#86e619>5</color> or more <color=#fff568>Charged</color>:
 > Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>150%</color> Piercing + clear <color=#86e619>2</color> positive effects + apply <color=#fff568>Bleed</color> and <color=#fff568>Disrupted</color>. Characters killed by this attack cannot be revived.
 > Lose <color=#86e619>5</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.

When <color=#fff568>Bleed</color> is applied to an enemy, fill Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>10%</color>.

Lower the Resistance of all <color=#fff568>BIO</color> enemies by <color=#86e619>100%</color>.
Lower the Counterattack Chance for all <color=#fff568>BIO</color> enemies with <color=#fff568>Immunity</color> by <color=#86e619>100%</color>.

Gain +<color=#86e619>100%</color> Focus
<color=#fff568>SECRET DEFENDER</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>100%</color> Focus.
